title: nI irangAyenil
sahitya:
nI irangAyenil pughalEdu amba nikhila jagannAthan mArbil uraidiru


anupallavi

  tAyirangAviDil shEyuyir vAzhumO sakala ulagirkkum nI tAyallavO


caraNam    pArkkaDalil uditta tirumaNiyE saubhAgya lakSmi ennaik-kaDaikkaNiyE 
nArk-kaviyum pozhiyum pulavorkkum mei jnAniyarkkum uyar vAnavarkkum amba
